summary: In 1960s Germany, criminal mastermind Dr. Mabuse uses hypnotized victims and the surveillance equipment of a Nazi-era bugged hotel to steal nuclear technology from a visiting American industrialist.
cast: Dawn Addams|Peter van Eyck|Gert Fröbe|Wolfgang Preiss|Werner Peters|Andrea Checchi|Marielouise Nagel|Reinhard Kolldehoff|Howard Vernon|Nico Pepe|Jean-Jacques Delbo|David Cameron|Linda Sini|Renate Küster|Rolf Weih|Rolf Möbius|Lotti Alberti|Manfred Grote|Maria Milde|Albert Bessler|Curt Ackermann|Werner Buttler|Dieter Hallervorden|Hans W. Hamacher|Christiane Maybach|Bruno W. Pantel|Egon Vogel|Wolfgang Völz
title: Los crímenes del doctor Mabuse
